data.name: Quetzal Demo
data.detailed_description:
Quetzal is a fast-paced, bullet hell platformer highly focused on reactive gameplay. You’ll discover a mystical underground world, defeat blood ravenous stone creatures, and survive tortuous obstacles in your quest for answers and meaning.



Embark on a mystic and profound journey as Quetzo, one of the last remnants of the Midbirds. Quetzo’s journey will be a rich, yet painful experience that will not only help restore the balance of nature, but make him come to terms with his heritage and his place in the world.

Features


  • Explore a tainted underground land from aeons ago, from the Forest Down Below to the Sanctuary of Reflection.
  • Master your skills and abilities to defeat ravenous stone creatures.
  • Find creative and unconventional solutions to overcome obstacles.
  • Bond with forest creatures to uncover the world’s ancient history.
  • Discover answers and restore the balance.
  • Minimal pixel art style.
